articles.title: Colon cancer: 7 ultra-processed foods you should avoid to reduce the risk - Times of India
articles.description: Colon cancer (also called colorectal cancer) is no longer just a disease of older adults — its incidence is rising sharply among people under 50. It is a type of cancer that develops in the tissues of the colon or rectum. It starts in the large intestine (col…
